name: Xcape (iuliu)
description:
Nox crash landed his space ship on an alien planet and now he has to collect dilithium crystals to re-power his ship, but he also needs to avoid being hurt by the many monsters on this strange planet.
See more about how we're making this game and others on our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVBEjDxkDe7YIjuAAOPg0lg
